vault_database_secret_backend_role.description: Configures a database secret backend role for Vault.

name.description: A unique name to give the role.

backend.description: The unique name of the Vault mount to configure.

db_name.description: The unique name of the database connection to use for

creation_statements.description: The database statements to execute when

revocation_statements.description: The database statements to execute when

rollback_statements.description: The database statements to execute when

renew_statements.description: The database statements to execute when

default_ttl.description: The default number of seconds for leases for this

max_ttl.description: The maximum number of seconds for leases for this
